Title: Joy's Wedding
Plot: Darnell and Joy decided to tie the knot while Earl learns thru Randy?s invitation that he is not invited.  To make things worse Joy has scheduled the wedding on Earl?s birthday so that all of their friends will be unable to celebrate with him. A drunken Earl crashes the party accidentally breaking Joy?s nose and now is forced to add ?ruined Joy?s wedding? to his list.
GuestStars: Lindsay Taylor,  Trey  Carlisle,  Bill  Suplee,  Dale Dickey,  Rakefet  Abergel,  Toya Brown,  Pam Trotter,  Sam Rubin,  Johnny  Hoops
